title: Looking for Bronze Elo Players who want to climb
body:
I am B4, currently looking to climb out of Bronze entirely
I haven't played ranked properly since S4, so I've just been decaying slowly
If there are any decent ADCs out there (pref Lucian or jinx) I can support carry you no problem
My champ pool (that I'm profficient at and note I have several accounts so my history won't even show some of these):
Top: Wu, Renekton, Malph, Lee, Jax, GP
Mid: Lb, Veig, Kat, Kass, Syndra, Ahri, Azir
Jungle: Lee, Elise, Vi, Mumu, Yi, Voli, Rengar
Adc: Jinx. Vayne, Varus, Graves, Kali, Luc
Support: Thresh, Leo, Braum, Ali, Blitz, Nami

Essentially I can hold my own in a team that has decent players, and if I get the right champ I can carry, but also help my team get fed by leaving kills etc. for team benefit

I don't use voice chat, cause I like listening to music but I ping non-stop

I'm a kiwi, but I have solid net to play with anyone and I play most days

Add me if you are keen to play, or reply to this thread!

replies.body: Ok im keen to play with you if your here and ready
I added you in game ... I'm in B3 currently and looking to climb up. I main adc and mid as secondary.
